title: Hess Gothic Round on myfonts.com
content:
Hi Guys, does anyone know of any websites apart from Myfonts.com, where I can buy the typeface 'Hess Gothic Round' ? The site isn't accepting my card for some reason.

....and before anyone asks, YES there is money on the card!

Thanks.
author: Kem

comments.content:
I'm using my Bank Account to fund the purchase though, and I need the font right now & there's no money on my actual paypal account.

You know of any other good websites to use ?
You can set up your paypal account so that it draws from your bank account if there's not enough money in the paypal account.
